Language.Text: Defend Raisu Station

Defend Raisu Station from Centauri warlords.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

The station master climbs up to her central console and raises her voice to address the crowd.
"Friends! The pilgrim has given us a fighting chance! Now we must rise to the challenge. The warlords will not free us willingly. Even now they are planning to retaliate.
"We must endure their attack and finish them once and for all!"

The station master turns to you:
"The warlords are coming to take Raisu Station. Will you help defend us?"

The citizens cheer, and the station master nods.
"All right, everyone! Get ready!"

The citizens grumble, but the station master calms them:
"All right, everyone! Don't worry, we've got time."

The station master is at her console monitoring the battle.
"Get back out there, %name%, the warlords are getting ready for more attacks!"

The halls of Raisu Station are filled with citizens on various tasks. Some are repairing damage from the battle, others are caring for the wounded.
The station master greets you with a smile:
"You've done it! The station is out of danger. But we'll never be truly safe until the warlords are defeated."

The halls of Raisu Station are filled with citizens on various tasks. Some are repairing damage from the battle, others are caring for the wounded.
The station master runs towards you:
"You've done it! The station is out of danger!"
She hugs you and whispers her name in your ear.

"You've done it! The station is out of danger!"
She beams a smile and hugs you.
LATER: We're all dead.
Mission complete!
